The [#!]Dunes Summon[#] features three Legendary Season V Heroes. There is also a chance to get the current Hero of the Month.

The Dunes Summon has an increased chance for [#!]Legendary[#] Heroes.

Summons can be done with gems or [#!]Dunes Coins[#] which can be obtained by completing [#!]Season V stages[#] for the first time. A single summon costs 100 Dunes Coins.

After every {0} summons a [#!]Dynasty of Dunes Bonus Chest[#] is granted. You can claim a maximum of [#!]{1}[#] chests during each Dunes Summon event.
